name: Tree of Life (itch) (Spike Studio)
description:
The mystical forest is being overrun by slimes! Place down different plants, protecting the sacred tree of life. Upgrade these plants to do more damage, and survive until the end!

The Tree of Life's path will be randomly generated each playthrough, so no two games are the same!


In this Tower Defense Roguelike, there is 6 unique towers, each with 2 upgrade paths of 3 upgrades, totaling 36 upgrades! There is 11 enemy types, and the map is random every game, so lots of content to enjoy!
